full_text: Case 1:20-cr-00330-PAE Document 753 Filed 08/10/22 Page 183 of 264 1621 LC7Cmax6 Carolyn - cross 1 A. I might be in the wrong -- THE COURT: Could you pull up to the microphone, please, Carolyn. A. I might be in the wrong binder. Is it this one? Q. It should have -- yes, I think that's the one, and it should be at C -- THE COURT: Well, there is no C. I think you mean tab 4? MR. PAGLIUCA: Yes, tab 4, which is going to be Exhibit C4. A. That has to do with me being arrested -- THE COURT: Just a moment. Just a moment. It's not what I have in my binder. MR. PAGLIUCA: Can we pull up C4 electronically, please. Q. ____, if you put that one down and we have the exhibit on the screen in front of you. A. Yes. It's also in the binder on the next page. MS. COMEY: Your Honor, can we approach? (Continued on next page) (Pages 1622 to 1624 SEALED) SOUTHERN DISTRICT REPORTERS, P.C. (212) 805-0300 DOJ-OGR-00018781
